import React from 'react' import styles from './JobArticle.module.scss' const JobArticle = ({ data, onFilterData }) => { const buttonsData = data.tools.concat(data.role, data.languages, data.level) const handleClick = (e) => { onFilterData(e.target.textContent) } const buttons = buttonsData.map((name, index) => ( )) return (

{data.company}

{data.new && New!} {data.featured && Featured}

{data.position}

{data.postedAt} {data.contract} {data.location}
{buttons}
) } export default JobArticle
